page.title: 13Pimperne Industry.O &J House
page.content: Mrs H.House is a teacher at this School she told us that O & J House have been in Pimperne for fifteen years.They make landscapes and lakes using very big machines called J.C.B.s.They also sell Tandy micro-computers. Tandy is an American computer. It is very hard work and Mr House and his twenty two employees work very long hours.Some years ago a very old thatched barn was burnt down by some boys playing with matches.Mrs House told us that she does not like computers,she likes teaching and people much better.
